entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 3 except temperature steady near zero along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Flurries or drizzle ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3 except temperature steady near zero along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 28 April 2023
